T02D3133:275a-0: @275a # // de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam
T02D3133:275a-1: gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i gzungs bklag pa'i cho ga

T02D3133:275b-3: lugs sku'am ras ris sam 'jim pa las byas pa yang rung ste /

T02D3133:275b-14: bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad dang /
T02D3133:275b-15: bum pa la sogs sta gon bya'o //
T02D3133:275b-16: mdo sde 'di dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3133:275b-17: phyin pa la sogs mdo sde zab cing rgya che

T02D3133:275b-28: bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pas de ltar byin

T02D3133:275b-36: par rgyas pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin

T02D3133:275b-40: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi smon
T02D3133:275b-41: lam khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D3133:275b-42: zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D3133:275b-43: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bkod
T02D3133:275b-44: pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te

T02D3133:276a-2: yangs pa reg na 'jam zhing bde ba dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba /
T02D3133:276a-3: tsandan sprul gyi snying po'i dri bsung dang ldan pa /
T02D3133:276a-4: lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa /
T02D3133:276a-5: mtha' rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pa /
T02D3133:276a-6: gser dang dngul dang mu tig gi phye ma gram dur bdal ba /
T02D3133:276a-8: ku mu ta dang padma 'gying zhing ldem pas khebs par gyur cing /
T02D3133:276a-9: chu bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa sgrogs pa /
T02D3133:276a-10: dga' zhing 'phyo ba lding bas brgyan pa /

T02D3133:276a-31: / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa /

T02D3133:276a-41: chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brten pa /

T02D3133:276a-43: nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba /

T02D3133:293a-6: tha dad pa mang po khams dang yul phyogs 'dir

T02D3133:293a-15: 'khor dang yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung

T02D3133:293a-17: mchis pa thams cad gang la yang gdul pa'i thabs

T02D3133:293a-24: par so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos bsgag cing

T02D3133:293a-28: gzungs sngags bzlas la khrus bya /

T02D3133:293a-44: kyis che ge mo la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas

T02D3133:293b-7: sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig /

T02D3133:293b-12: gi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing bde

T02D3133:293b-31: bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol ba ni /

T02D3133:293b-33: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun 'khor dang
T02D3133:293b-34: bcas pa dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal

T02D3133:293b-36: spyan sngar che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba

T02D3133:293b-44: pa 'khrul zhing nongs pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs
T02D3133:294a-0: rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la @294a *
T02D3133:294a-1: // bzod par gsol zhing mchis na thugs brtse bar

T02D3133:294a-20: pa ltar // rin chen sa gzhi me tog bcas //

T02D3133:294a-27: 'jig rten skyabs su gshegs su gsol //
T02D3133:294a-28: bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //

T02D3133:294a-30: bdag gis phul ba'i mchod yon 'di //

T02D3133:294a-33: srid sogs nyes pa mi mnga' yang //

T02D3133:294a-35: gtsang ma'i chu yis sku khrus gsol //
T02D3133:294a-37: dpal ldan dag pa'i gnas bshams par //

T02D3133:294a-40: gtsang dang sa gdan khri yangs pa la //
T02D3133:294a-41: thogs dang dog pa med pa'i sku //
T02D3133:294a-42: mnyam nyid tshul gyis 'dir bzhugs shing //

T02D3133:294b-0: zhes de ltar @294b yon chab dang sku khrus gsol /
T02D3133:294b-2: de'i 'og tu ston pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas pa la spyi'i phyag byas te /
T02D3133:294b-4: 'gro ba nyon mongs dug gis gzir ba la //
T02D3133:294b-5: thugs rje dug sel sman mchog bdud rtsi ni //
T02D3133:294b-6: smon lam chen pos grub par gyur pa yi //

T02D3133:294b-9: gzir ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas spyod tshe thugs rje yis //

T02D3133:294b-11: bde gshegs bdun po 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo //

T02D3133:294b-15: de'i 'og tu re re nas mchod pa ni //

T02D3133:294b-21: shes bya kun la chags pa'i thugs mnga' la //

T02D3133:294b-27: gser bzangs dri med del phyag 'tshal lo //

T02D3133:294b-29: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gdung ba sel mdzad pa //
T02D3133:294b-30: 'gro drug mgon dang dpal du gyur pa po //
T02D3133:294b-31: mya ngan med mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3133:294b-32: chos sgra chen pos pha rol rgol ba 'joms //
T02D3133:294b-33: rgya mtsho lta bur dangs pa'i sku mnga' zhing //

T02D3133:294b-37: rnam dag chos kyi dbyings la rol mdzad de //
